bill.title: Fair and Open Skies Act
bill.description: To ensure that authorizations issued by the Secretary of Transportation to foreign air carriers do not undermine labor rights or standards, and for other purposes.

history.action: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Aviation.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Ordered to be Reported by Voice Vote.
Reported by the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure. H. Rept. 117-651.
Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 470.

calendar.description: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure Hearing
